text: Valter Bombassei (born May 27, 1965 in Auronzo di Cadore) is an Italian curler. At the international level, he is a 2006 European Mixed Curling Championship silver medallist. At the national level, he is a three-time Italian men's champion curler and a two-time Italian mixed champion curler. ==Teams== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |-
